test.name: Käyttäjänä voin synkronoida data eri koneiden välillä CLI-sovelluksessa

kw.name: Get Fresh Access Token
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://api.dropbox.com/oauth2/token path_url=/oauth2/token headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, zstd', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '159', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=grant_type=refresh_token&refresh_token=qsGeW1E_JfEAAAAAAAAAARmDvqCaJ3GkYGfZH1HlvQ8Vv3fe_FfIiG6gEBhDDTJ9&client_id=zibp4mktr3ptkvc&client_secret=52pj9bzbt0ulb7l

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
Exchanges the Refresh Token for a short-lived Access Token

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.
